Description.Text: This brand new hotel is set in a unique location amongst 280 acres of lakes and parkland that was once the home of Sir Robert Peel. It is just 250 metres from the entrance to Drayton Manor Theme Park, with a range of thrilling roller coasters and home of Thomas Land and Drayton Manor Zoo. Every bit of the luxurious Drayton Manor Hotel caters to the modern family and business traveller. We have 150 contemporary guest rooms including 11 Thomas & Friends themed family bedrooms, interconnecting bedrooms, super rooms which can sleep 4 and Presidential suites. There are 2 Restaurants, one with Garden Pavilion and 2 Bars. For the children, and those that are young at heart, we have a Video games room, Character breakfasts and coming soon is our Thomas & Friends Theatre. The Hotel also offers free car parking and has wireless internet access throughout.

There is an abundance of local attractions in and around Tamworth for some great days out, including, Tamworth Snowdome, Conkers, Calke Abbey, Shakerstone Railway, Tamworth Castle and Broomey Croft childrens Farm. The hotel is just off the A4091, close to Junction 9 of the M42. Tamworth Rail Station is just 4 miles away.

Family 3 Room - With one double bed and one sofa bed. Rooms are equipped with Safety Deposit Box, Air Conditioning, Iron, Work Desk, Heating, Carpeted Floor, Shower, Bath, Hairdryer, Bathroom Amenities, Toilet, Bathroom, TV, Telephone, Tea/Coffee Maker and Electric Kettle.
Standard Twin Room - With two single beds. Rooms are equipped with Safety Deposit Box, Air Conditioning, Iron, Work Desk, Heating, Carpeted Floor, Shower, Bath, Hairdryer, Bathroom Amenities, Toilet, Bathroom, TV, Telephone, Tea/Coffee Maker and Electric Kettle.
Family 6 Room - Standard Family interconnecting rooms comprise of two rooms the first is a double bed with sofa bed which leads into a twin bedroom with truckle bed. With all the same facilities and decoration as our Family room with the added convenience of separate rooms, TV's and bathrooms. The interconnecting doors can be left open all evening giving the freedom to be able to move freely between the bedrooms. Please note when the Sofa bed or Truckle bed is in use we cannot accommodate cots in the same room.
Family 5 Room - Standard Family interconnecting rooms comprise of two rooms the first is a double bed with sofa bed which leads into a twin bedroom with truckle bed. With all the same facilities and decoration as our Family room with the added convenience of separate rooms, TV's and bathrooms. The interconnecting doors can be left open all evening giving the freedom to be able to move freely between the bedrooms. Please note when the Sofa bed or Truckle bed is in use we cannot accommodate cots in the same room.
Standard Double Room - With one double bed. Rooms are equipped with Safety Deposit Box, Air Conditioning, Iron, Work Desk, Heating, Carpeted Floor, Shower, Bath, Hairdryer, Bathroom Amenities, Toilet, Bathroom, TV, Telephone, Tea/Coffee Maker and Electric Kettle.
Executive Double Room - Spacious room with one double bed and sitting area. Rooms are equipped with Safety Deposit Box, Air Conditioning, Iron, Work Desk, Heating, Carpeted Floor, Shower, Bath, Hairdryer, Bathroom Amenities, Toilet, Bathroom, TV, Telephone, Tea/Coffee Maker and Electric Kettle.
Family 4 Room - With one double bed and one sofa bed. Rooms are equipped with Safety Deposit Box, Air Conditioning, Iron, Work Desk, Heating, Carpeted Floor, Shower, Bath, Hairdryer, Bathroom Amenities, Toilet, Bathroom, TV, Telephone, Tea/Coffee Maker and Electric Kettle.
